title: Architect designed, modern three storied house with custom made furniture.
details:
House size: 7500 sqft
Land size: 17 perches
6 large bed rooms with 5 bathrooms
1 office room with attached washroom
servant room with bathroom
Solar powered hot water system
Garage with two vehicle parking space
Separate vehicle parking for 6 vehicles.

Contact : 0777-962396 (only by appointment)
